class.name: bbr.esb.users.entities.Access
class.sql-query: select AC.COMPANY_ID as COMPANYKEY, AC.SITE_ID as SITEKEY, AC.NAME as NAME, AC.CODE as CODE, CO.NAME as COMPANYNAME, SI.NAME as SITENAME from ACCESS as AC join COMPANY as CO on AC.COMPANY_ID = CO.ID join SITE as SI on AC.SITE_ID = SI.ID where CO.ID = :companyid
SELECT ac.code FROM public.access as ac INNER JOIN public.company as co ON co.id=ac.company_id INNER JOIN public.site as si ON si.id= ac.site_id WHERE si.name=:sitename AND co.rut=:companyrut
